fr.sii.ogham.core.translator.content

Class MultiContentTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.translator.content.MultiContentTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentTranslator

    public class MultiContentTranslator
extends Object
implements ContentTranslator

    Decorator that is able to handle MultiContent. A MultiContent can provide several contents to put into the final message. For example, emails can send both HTML and text content.

    This implementation calls the delegate content translator to apply translation on each sub content of the MultiContent. It can be useful to apply content translations on every sub content like it should be applied for normal content.

    The same translator is applied for all sub contents.

    If the content is not a MultiContent, then the content is returned as-is.

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
